snippet: The downhill course for the Winter Games in Sochi, Russia, drew mixed reviews from racers preparing for this weekend’s World Cup.
abstract: United States ski team arrives in Sochi, Russia, for its first look at the downhill course for the 2014 Winter Olympics; team's run down the mountain, which will be used for upcoming World Cup events, produced mixed reviews.
lead_paragraph: The downhill course for the Winter Games in Sochi, Russia, drew mixed reviews from racers preparing for this weekend’s World Cup.

headline.seo: U.S. Skiers Get Preview of 2014 Olympic Course
headline.main: U.S. Skiers Get First Look at 2014 Olympic Course, and They Aren’t All Impressed
headline.print_headline: U.S. Skiers Get First Look at 2014 Olympic Course, and They Aren’t All Impressed
